verbs.description: six face charges in killing of grady [ARGM-LOC: county] [ARG1: jail] [V: inmate] a security camera at the grady county jail recorded the bloody fatal attack on an inmate there last month leading to murder charges thursday against six men who were in the same jail pod grady county oklahoma irven box jackson grady county investigator mollman attorney grady county assistant district sitlington anthony john mollman curry
